missions.title: Mission 1: Awakening the First Crystal
missions.description: Turn the LED on and off at position 3,5 using blocks. Practice basic LED control.

missions.title: Mission 2: Memory Crystals of Elder Triceratops
missions.description: Use variables to store value and turn the LED on at that value. Demonstrate variable usage.

missions.title: Mission 3: The Guardian's Challenge
missions.description: Use the ultrasonic sensor to detect distance and control the LED based on sensor input. Practice If-else logic.

missions.title: Mission 4: Rhythm of the Ancient Pterodactyl
missions.description: Turn on all the LED on and off using repeat. Practice loops.

missions.title: FINALE: The Great Illumination Ceremony
missions.description: Combine sensors, variables, loops, and LED blocks to create a multi-step light show program.
